original_text: They buried there the bodies of people who had wanted better food. So the people called that place Kibroth-Hattaavah.
korean_text: 그 곳 이름을 기브롯 핫다아와라 불렀으니 욕심을 낸 백성을 거기 장사함이었더라

sentences.original_text: They buried there the bodies of people
So the people called that place Kibroth-Hattaavah
